episode_event_egg_meowth/4001_1001_0200_:
Both Alolan Meowth and Galarian Meowth are
superduper cute!
episode_event_egg_meowth/4001_1001_0400_: Hey. You there, girl. You like Meowth, do you?
episode_event_egg_meowth/4001_1001_0500_:
Totally! My name’s Andrea, and my partner
Pokémon is Meowth, too!
episode_event_egg_meowth/4001_1001_0600_: I love how they’re so carefree and adorable!
episode_event_egg_meowth/4001_1001_0700_:
Yeah. Would be nice to live without caring what
other people think, the way Meowth do.
episode_event_egg_meowth/4001_1001_0900_:
Back in Alola, and even here on Pasio...aren’t you
taking care of too many Meowth?
episode_event_egg_meowth/4001_1001_1000_:
Eh, it’s my way of helping others. I’m a
police officer, after all.
episode_event_egg_meowth/4001_1001_1100_: Why are there so many Meowth here?
episode_event_egg_meowth/4001_1001_1200_:
Professor Bellis has been hatching different kinds of
Meowth Eggs back at her lab.
episode_event_egg_meowth/4001_1001_1400_:
I’ve heard that Meowth’s characteristics can differ
from region to region.
episode_event_egg_meowth/4001_1001_1500_: Yep. Alolan Meowth are prideful and sly.
episode_event_egg_meowth/4001_1001_1600_: Allister told me that Galarian Meowth are brave!
episode_event_egg_meowth/4001_1001_1700_: Oh, really? I didn’t know that.
episode_event_egg_meowth/4001_1001_1800_:
Hey, mister! Could I help take care of these
Meowth, too?
episode_event_egg_meowth/4001_1001_2100_:
I’m gonna study up on Meowth and become a
Meowth master!
episode_event_egg_meowth/4001_1001_2200_: A Meowth master, eh? That’s ambitious.
episode_event_egg_meowth/4001_1001_2300_:
Maybe I should flip a coin to predict how that
future of yours will turn out.
